title: M-02 Change Payload Schema
description: Defines the mandatory structure for the executable M-02 Change Payload, containing the actual code changes linked by an M-01 Intent. This ensures structural validation before execution stage (Stage 3).

intent_id_reference.description: UUID referencing the primary M-01 Intent mandate.

evolutionary_operations.description: List of atomic file operations (Add, Modify, Delete).

file_path.description: The path of the file being modified.

content_data.description: Base64 encoded new content or diff (null for DELETE operation).

complexity_score.description: Pre-calculated metric representing the complexity (e.g., lines changed, token delta).
